Package com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.scp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IScpMessageSender  
    IScpProcessingListener  
    IScpSupportVersion11Level1
    Interface defining SCP 11 Level 1 compliance operations.
    IScpSupportVersion11Level2
    Interface defining SCP 11 Level 2 compliance operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FastScpDecoder
    CameronFAST utility for decoding any FAST input stream.
    FastScpEncoder
    CameronFAST utility for encoding messages using FAST.
    ScpInboundContext
    Responsible for providing SCP message templates to the session's FastInputStream.
    ScpMessageFactory
    Factory to create SCP outbound message of type ScpOutboundMessage
    ScpOutboundContext
    Used by FIX sessions to transform outgoing SCP messages into FAST encoded bytes.
    ScpOutboundMessage
    An SCP outbound message is a special case of OrderedFIXMessage with the following differences:
    It does not contain a msgType field or any other FIX specific tag (msg sequence number, checksum etc...) SCP messages (Hello, Reset and Alert) does not contain a common tag which can be used as a selector.
    ScpSupportHandler
    The SCP object is the intermediary between the Session object and the ScpInboundContext and ScpOutboundContext objects.
    ScpTemplateSelector
    SCP message factories need a special selector as there is no common field for all SCP outbound messages.
    ScpVersion11Level1Handler  
    ScpVersion11Level2Handler  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncomingScpAlert  
    ScpException
